modName: Saved game - Skip Ustengrav to the fun part with Lava the dark elf
summary: Boring main quest Ustengrav and Mage college Saarthal opening sequence, and also don't want to fight Vilkas at the courtyard the 101th time? Ok, just skip that!
descriptionHtml:
Boring main quest Ustengrav and Mage college Saarthal opening sequence, and also don't want to fight Vilkas at the courtyard the 101th time? Ok, just skip that!

I have made a play through of my female dark elf, Lava, a Battlemage (mainly one-handed with shield), who is now on level 16. She has Jenassa as her follower. Unmarried and have not purchased any house yet. There are some ores and gears stored in the chest at Jorrvaskr (in the dining area). Lava also has Lover's Stone active which gives her no sleeping bonus.

There are some saved games on nexus that simply skipped High Hrothgar and Ustengrav, but most of them stay in Level 1. It is better to have Lava level up so don't have to spend more time leveling up again. Before I create this I was playing Nord Joey (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51464/) I guess many of you have played as a Nord before, so try something new.


Questline
Main quest: Just finished Ustengrav, you have to find Delphine in Riverwood.
Companions: Find Skjor (Before the part that you have to gain your beast blood)
Mages College: Finish Saarthal, you have to inform the Arch-Mage
Thieves Guild: not started
Darkbrotherhood: not started
Civil War: not started (Ralof side at Helgen)

I have also completed some misc quest from Whiterun and Solitude. I forgot why I got to Solitude, but I am going to support the Stormcloaks in the game later because I never want Maven to be the Jarl (Maven will be the Jarl of Riften if the imperial wins).

Mods recommend to be installed:
Coverwomen: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3563
Amazing Follower Tweaks: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?
Natural Eyes: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?

Change your appearance/race
Press ` and type showracemenu

Add me as a friend on Steam (kin459011). Feel free to chat, always online.:)
author: kin459011-sarah

files.name: Lava - all saves from level 1 to level 16
